channel.title: Error when npc is spawned
channel.description:
Since some time every spawned npc gives t2 error, here a picture of it:
[IMG]http://i787.photobucket.com/albums/yy160/ownerlink/errors.jpg[/img]
it actually happens when i spawn an npc and i or it attacks, i get dc and when i log back in it dcs again until i do ::npcreset it also happens when an npc is spawned at jad minigame. please someone help ill rep++

item.title: Error when npc is spawned
item.dc:creator: @dutchboy dutchboy
item.description:
@dutchboy wrote:

npcs are automaticly spawned at fight cave, also its very annoying and i wasnt asking what not to do but what TO do

Read full topic

item.title: Error when npc is spawned
item.dc:creator: @lorenso lorenso
item.description:
@lorenso wrote:

dutchboy:

dude, what u mean with reload?? becouse it always happen when an npc is spawned and its not client sided.

Then don’t spawn any npcs.

Read full topic

item.title: Error when npc is spawned
item.dc:creator: @lorenso lorenso
item.description:
@lorenso wrote:

[quote="!Joshua, post:3, topic:311882"][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=408327.msg3014229#msg3014229 date=1257079033]
if this happens in the client cmd box then it actually does this.

because when i play some servers, i usually get something like that after a while and i just gotta re-run client…
[/quote]
Please explain in english?
Also please point out the part where you helped him?[/quote]
Wow, just reload the client and ur done.

Read full topic
